drinks.name: Cuba Libre
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of Rum, 15 ml of lime, juice, cola
drinks.extended_description: To create this legendary cocktail, fill a glass with lots of ice, squeeze and drop 2 lime wedges into the glass, coating the ice well with the juices, Pour in the Bacardi Oro, top up with chilled cola and stir gently

drinks.name: Sex On The Beach
drinks.description: Casual but kinda sweet drink based on vodka
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of vodka, 20 ml of archers, 50 ml of orange juice, 50 ml of cranberry juice
drinks.extended_description: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Pour the vodka, peach schnapps and fruit juices into a large jug and stir, garnish with the cocktail cherries and orange slices.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: Custom sweet and sour drink based on vodka
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of lemon vodka, 20 ml of cointreau, 15 ml of lime juice, 30 ml of cranberry juice
drinks.extended_description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a cocktail glass, get an orange zest for garnish

drinks.name: Blood Marry
drinks.description: Custom drink, perfect after a good party
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of vodka, 100 ml of tomato juice, 15 ml of sour, Dash of Worchestershire, Tabasco and salt
drinks.extended_description: Place the ice in a large jug. Measure the vodka, tomato juice and lemon juice and pour it straight onto the ice, Add worchestoire and tabasco, sti until the outside of the jug feels cold then strain the cocktail into glass. Top up with fresh ice and garnish with lemon slice.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.description: Classical drink based on tequila with interessing story, really dry
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of tequila, 20 ml of Cointreau, 20 ml of lime juice
drinks.extended_description: Prepare the glass, combine all ingredients in shaker shake for something like 20-30 seconds until chilled, taste and get a garnish with salt/sweet crusta

drinks.name: Tequila Sunrise
drinks.description: Next drink based on tequila, this one is kinda sweet thanks to grenadina
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of tequila, A little bit of grenadina at the down of glass, Orange juice to the end of the glass
drinks.extended_description: Fill glass with ice cubes, pour the tequilla and orange juice, stir a bit and pour the grenadina at the top of the cocktai that will sink.

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.description: Type of dry drink based on good bourbon with red vermouth
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of good bourbon, 20 ml of good red vermouth, 2 x dash of Angoustura Bitter
drinks.extended_description: Add the bourbon (or rye), sweet vermouth and both bitters to a mixing glass with ice, and stir until well-chilled., strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with an brandied cherry

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: Next dry drink based on whisky, this one is without vermouth often served with sugar cube
drinks.ingredients: 50 ml of good bourbon, 3 x dash of Angoustura Bitter, 5 ml of sweet (Optional instead of sugar cube)
drinks.extended_description: Add the sugar and bitters to a rocks glass, then add the water, and stir until the sugar is nearly dissolved, fill the glass with large ice cubes, add the bourbon, and gently stir to combine, express the oil of an orange pee lover the glass then droop in

drinks.name: Whisky Sour
drinks.description: Typical sour based on all whisky
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of whisky, 30 ml of sour, 20 ml of sweet, 2x dash of Angoustura
drinks.extended_description: Put ice and all of the ingredients into a shaker and shake hard for about 20 seconds to chill the liquid really well, strain the mix into a glass filled with ice and garnish with the cherry and orange slice

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: Classical drink based on white rum
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of rum, Half of lime, Some mint leaves, 2 tablespoons of brown sugar, A little bit of soda water
drinks.extended_description: Muddle the lime juice, sugar and mint leaves in a small jug, crushing the mint as you go â€“ you can use the end of a rolling pin for this. Pour into a tall glass and add a handful of ice, pour over the rum, stirring with a long-handled spoon. Top up with soda water, garnish with mint and serve.

drinks.name: Daiqiri
drinks.description: The next classical drink based on white rum, some of people says that this is Rum Sour thanks to ingredients
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of white rum, 20 ml of lime juice, 10 ml of sweet
drinks.extended_description: Add the rum, lime juice and sugar syrup to a shaker with ice, and shake until well-chilled, Strain into a chilled coupe, garnish with a lime twist

drinks.name: Tom Collins
drinks.description: The next sour this time based on the gin
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of gin, 30 ml of sour, 20 ml of sweet, Top up of soda water
drinks.extended_description: Add the gin, lemon juice and simple syrup to a Collins glass, fill with ice, top with club soda and stir, garnish with a lemon wheel and maraschino cherry

drinks.name: Martini
drinks.description: Classic drink of James Bond, really consummate designed to real fanatics
drinks.ingredients: 60 ml of good gin, A little bit of white dry vermouth
drinks.extended_description: Stir the gin or vodka, dry vermouth and a little ice together or put them in a cocktail shaker to combine, strain into a chilled martini glass. Serve with an olive on a cocktail stick or a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Aperol Spritz
drinks.description: Typical Italian aperitif, perfect for long sunny days
drinks.ingredients: 80 ml of Aperol, 120 ml of Prosecco, Top up of soda water
drinks.extended_description: Fill your large wine glass with plenty of ice, add 3 parts Prosecco, then 2 parts Aperol, add a dash of soda and stir briefly, garnish with an orange slice and enjoy!

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: The next type of dry drink, based on Campari
drinks.ingredients: 40 ml of Gin, 40 ml of Campari, 40 ml of red sweet vermouth
drinks.extended_description: Add the gin, Campari and sweet vermouth to a mixing glass filled with ice, and stir until well-chilled, strain into a rocks glass filled with large ice cubes, garnish with an orange peel
